meta.title: VoiceScribe - AI Transcription for Meetings & Lectures | Free Speech to Text
meta.description: VoiceScribe: The best Chrome extension for AI-powered Speech to Text. Transcribe Zoom, Google Meet calls and lectures in real time. Free AI summaries.
meta.keywords: voice transcription, speech to text, AI summary, meeting notes, chrome extension, transcribe zoom, transcribe lectures, voice typing, free

problem.title: ðŸš€ Automatic Notes, Zero Distractions
problem.text: Tired of missing details in your video calls? With our Persistent Sidebar Mode, VoiceScribe transcribes your meetings or online classes while you keep browsing.
problem.cardText: Your personal note assistant, always visible.

features.f1Text: Transcribe audio to text in English, Spanish, French, Japanese and more. 99% native accuracy.
features.f2Text: Turn a 1-hour recording into a 5-minute summary. Perfect for students and meeting minutes.
features.f3Text: Your data stays local. No external server uploads. Your privacy is our top priority.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.t1Quote: "I thought it would be complicated, but the Sidebar Mode is exactly what I always needed. I never lose track in my meetings anymore."
testimonials.t2Quote: "The best extension for taking notes in my online classes. The automatic summary is pure magic."

faq.title: Voice Transcription FAQ
faq.a1: Right now, VoiceScribe is 100% FREE for a limited time. We want you to try the tool with zero barriers. We may introduce paid plans later, but if you join now you'll enjoy everything at no cost.
faq.a2: We use advanced Web Speech API technology, achieving over 95% accuracy in clear audio conditions. It works best with a good microphone and moderate background noise.
faq.q3: Does it work with Zoom, Google Meet or YouTube?
faq.a3: Yes. VoiceScribe captures your microphone audio. If you use speakers, it will pick up meeting or video audio too. For best results, use your system's "Stereo Mix" mode if available.
faq.a4: Absolutely. Privacy is our #1 priority. Transcriptions are processed locally in your browser. We only send text to OpenAI when you explicitly request a summary, and nothing is stored on our servers.
faq.q5: Do I need my own OpenAI key?
faq.a5: No. Since VoiceScribe is free, you can use our AI directly. If you prefer to use your own API key for more control, we offer that option in settings.
